column6: "CONTAGION, CHAPTER FIVE: LOOKING FOR A WAY OUT"  Contagion and his bloodthirsty posse have thrown everything and the kitchen sink at Wolverine, yet still he stands. Now it's time for him to teach the "Unkillables" a thing or two about pain.  And when he's through with them, he's got something special planned for their leader.
column8: | penciller (cover):Bryan Hitch | writer:Charlie Huston | penciller:Juan Jose Ryp | editor:Jeanine Schaefer
